name: parse-values
description: parse a string of values with separators, quotes and escape, and returns an array
author: Christophe Hurpeau <christophe@hurpeau.com> (https://christophe.hurpeau.com)

scripts.generate:test-coverage: rm -Rf coverage/ ; NODE_ENV=production node --harmony --es_staging node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --recursive --reporter=spec -u tdd test/node6
scripts.prepublish: ln -s ../../git-hooks/pre-commit .git/hooks/pre-commit 2>/dev/null || true ; ln -s ../../git-hooks/post-checkout .git/hooks/post-checkout 2>/dev/null || true ; ln -s ../../git-hooks/post-merge .git/hooks/post-merge 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run build && pob-repository-check-clean
